metadata.title: CVE-2021-22904 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: The actionpack ruby gem before 6.1.3.2, 6.0.3.7, 5.2.4.6, 5.2.6 suffersfrom a possible denial of service vulnerability in the Token Authenticationlogic in Action Controller due to a too permissive regular expression.Impacted code uses `authenticate_or_request_with_http_token` or`authenticate_with_http_token` for request authentication.

criterions.comment: rails package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
